name: Perspective 3D Carousel
author: tishonator

sections.description:
Demo

Perspective 3D Carousel PRO plugin allows you to insert and configure a Responsive jQuery Slider into your WordPress site as a shortcode. Admin Slide Fields for Title, Text, and Image.

Pro Features

  • Configure Up to 10 Different Sliders
  • Insert Up to 10 Slides per Slider
  • Slide Buttons
  • Slider Settings: Height, Sliding Delay, Color Options
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the perspective-3d-carousel folder to the to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Navigate to Admin Panel -> ‘Perspective 3D Carousel’ -> fill Slider fields
  4. Insert the shortcode [perspective-3d-carousel] to display Slider to any page or post
  5. Enjoy!
sections.changelog:
1.0.1 (January 10, 2021)

  • fix issue with slider position when parent div is centered

1.0.0 (December 25, 2020)

  • Plugin released
